mapper.select: SELECT m.PROFILE_PIC, m.USER_NAME, msg.MSG_NO, msg.MSG_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(msg.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "sendDate", msg.CH_NO, msg.SENDER_NO, msg.RECEIVER_NO, msg.MSG_STATUS FROM MESSAGE msg JOIN MEMBER m ON m.USER_NO = msg.SENDER_NO WHERE msg.CH_NO = #{chNo} AND ((msg.SENDER_NO = #{senderNo} AND msg.RECEIVER_NO = #{receiverNo}) OR (msg.SENDER_NO = #{receiverNo} AND msg.RECEIVER_NO = #{senderNo})) ORDER BY msg.SEND_DATE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_room CR WHERE (CR.user_no = #{userNo} OR CR.trainer_no = #{userNo}) AND CR.status = 'Y'

SELECT CR.CH_NO AS chatRoomNo, M.MSG_CONTENT AS lastMessage, M.SEND_DATE AS lastActive, CR.TRAINER_NO AS participantNo, U.USER_NAME AS participantName, U.PROFILE_PIC AS participantImage, U.STATUS AS participantStatus FROM CHAT_ROOM CR JOIN MESSAGE M ON CR.CH_NO = M.CH_NO JOIN MEMBER U ON CR.TRAINER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE CR.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND M.SEND_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(M2.SEND_DATE) FROM MESSAGE M2 WHERE M2.CH_NO = CR.CH_NO AND M2.SENDER_NO = CR.TRAINER_NO ) ORDER BY lastActive DESC

SELECT CR.CH_NO AS chatRoomNo, M.MSG_CONTENT AS lastMessage, M.SEND_DATE AS lastActive, CR.USER_NO AS participantNo, U.USER_NAME AS participantName, U.PROFILE_PIC AS participantImage, U.STATUS AS participantStatus FROM CHAT_ROOM CR JOIN MESSAGE M ON CR.CH_NO = M.CH_NO JOIN MEMBER U ON CR.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE CR.TRAINER_NO = #{userNo} AND M.SEND_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(M2.SEND_DATE) FROM MESSAGE M2 WHERE M2.CH_NO = CR.CH_NO AND M2.SENDER_NO = CR.USER_NO ) ORDER BY lastActive DESC

SELECT user_no, user_id, user_pwd, user_name, email, phone, gender, age, address, enroll_date, user_level, pt, status, api, qr, profile_pic, membership FROM member WHERE user_level = 1 AND user_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
